website_summaries.verdict: Retro styling combined with a wide, nicely-fitting footbed make for a fun and fashionable combo.
pros: Herringbone saddles and high, almost 3-inch heel make for a stylish oxford shoe
cons: Run a bit large, so ordering by European sizing rather than U.S. sizes may help
Could use more cushioning across the footbed

customer_reviews.title: Love my super cute oxfords!
customer_reviews.text: These (and other) 1920s-inspired oxfords that Clarks makes are just adorable! I got them in both black and brown (which I believe is referred to as 'burgundy'). They are so feminine, elegant, and very cute. I feel like a flapper:) I'm either a size 11 or 12, but usually find that I have to wear a size 12 with thick socks. Surprisingly, I got these in a 12, and they fit just right with a thinner type of sock; it could be that I haven't broken them in yet. They could complement almost anything. I couldn't help but post photos of me wearing them with patterned palazzo pants and seemingly clash-y striped socks. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Many Compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. I walk about 6-7 hours a day on carpeted showroom floors. My feet had not been in a heel for a couple years because of surgery for a partially torn tendon and torn cartilage in ankle. I wore these 6 of 8 hours that day without a problem. My feet just got tired, but not hurting anywhere, if that makes sense. Look awesom with slacks.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Haase

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes and I can tell they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes and I can tell they are comfortable. They were just a tad tight so I returned. I ordered my regular size because I expect to wear them with nylons, not socks. Am waiting for the next half size to be available at the same price! Update: Ordered the burgundy because the black one half size up was too expensive. Should have listened to other reviewers, they were indeed brown. Returned again, and after waiting a long time in vain for the 7.5 to go down in price, I decided to bite the bullet and get them anyway, because they were too beautiful. Oh well, it's ok to splurge once in a while, no?
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: A little bit more padding under the ball of the foot and these would be even more perfect. But these are nice
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on a day where I was on my feet a lot and by the end of the day my feet were a bit sore, but I could still walk. A little bit more padding under the ball of the foot and these would be even more perfect. But these are nice. I will wear them to work again, but maybe not on a day where I've got so much time on my feet planned. (I don't wear heels ever)
customer_reviews.author: rainbowdolph

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Womans Cleason Oxford leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: They were very good quality shoes but I had to return because when ordering a C/W width you must order a half size smaller. I like the wide width because it lets your feet breath and gives the added room for when your feet swell. I also have lower back and spine disease and the heel was a nice block but heavy. I would have still worn had the heel been lighter an not 3 inches. Saddly they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoes. Style and color are perfect. Receive compliments every time I wear them. I am on my feet all day, and they are very comfortable. I ordered a 5.5, have other Clarks in this size. This shoe is a little narrow, but not too bad. Broke in after a few wears. If you like thicker socks, I suggest ordering a half size up. I usually wear nylons or dress socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This new pair went on like butter and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Clarks. I bought these to replace another pair of lace-up Clarks, After eight years of constant wearing, they are looking a little worn, lol. I am keeping them with my Halloween stuff as they still have some life left. This new pair went on like butter and are very comfortable. Did I say I have always been a fan of Clarks?
customer_reviews.author: Rdy2226

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this size a bit larger than I needed. This is my first time purchasing Clark Shoes. I love these shoes. I was just trying to be careful and size up but I really didn't need to do that. I wear this with a thick pair of socks. I love the heel; it is a very good height. I would buy these again at my correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes and wish they had my size (10 W) in every color. I have them in black and burgundy. They are THE most comfortable shoe I have ever owned. I feel stylish as well as supported. I've worn them with office pant suits as well as jeans. This VALUE and versatility of these shoes is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Alfermann

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. So reminiscent of the 1920's styles. I've never been disappointed in Clarks. They are always comfortable and once I found what size fits me, I've had no problems ordering on line. I'm between a 5 and a 5 1/2. The platform on this is not high at all and there is sufficient padding in the ball of the foot. I wore them all day yesterday and they were sooo comfortable. Great with pants and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Greco

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable and All-around GREAT purchase
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 pair of these awesome, soft, comfortable and sturdy shoes. Great even if on your feet all day (teacher); always get compliments when I wear them...in brown or black and white. I have had my other pair for over 2 years and they are still in terrific shape, so I bought this beautiful burgundy color. Would purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: SZBlack

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable despite the heels
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable despite the heels. In fact, there was NO "breaking in" period. Very pretty to look at also.
customer_reviews.author: Deliutz

customer_reviews.title: I have bad feet ans I can wear these through a work ...
customer_reviews.text: would wear more if tge heel was a little lower. I have bad feet ans I can wear these through a work day but if I try for day two I find myself wishing I didnt
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of these Clark's. So glad I gave them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Dillion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but loose lace
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable and fits great. However, the shoe lace is very loose; no matter how tight I try to tie it, it always comes loose.
customer_reviews.author: Melinsky

customer_reviews.title: Clark’s women's Claeson Pearl Oxford
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are very comfortable and stylish. I wore out my first pair and I was happy to find the same shoe once again.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These were gorgeous but I wanted a bit more of a boot so I returned them but I still have 2nd thought and wonder if I should have kept them. I really love this shoe. It's a beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Fire Fan

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! Really didn't have to break them in - they fit well right out of the box. Very comfortable, very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Classy beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Perfect and so comfortable. Love these shoes! Shipped so fast I didn't know what the package was. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Phat Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but may need a breaking in period.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but a little uncomfortable--they cut into my ankles a little. I hope they will stretch some after I've worn them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these heels! I’m an attorney and they’re comfortable, even standing in court for hours on end! I get tons of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: love love love them
customer_reviews.text: love love love them, I'm​ on my feet a lot passing out flyers and they are perfect, professional and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Josie V.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. The quality of the leather and color are great. Looks like a very expensive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Over 60

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look good, very professional. Good cushioning on the inside as well. I found the heel height unmanageable.
customer_reviews.author: cosmic athlete

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and seem comfortable. Returned because they don't really fit my style. A little too "heavy" looking.
customer_reviews.author: sole

customer_reviews.title: I love Clarks. These are adorable heeled oxfords
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks. These are adorable heeled oxfords, super versatile and very comfortable. Material inside is soft to the touch, and the soles and the back of the heel are cushioned, meaning they're quite comfortable for standing and walking in. Fit is as expected, with some adjustment possible with the laces (they are functional, despite how they look in the picture).
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable & Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, and they look great! My feet don't get tired regardless of whether I'm on my feet all day or not. Definitely my favorite pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, I wear them 10+ hours a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, I wear them 10+ hours a day at work and they are super comfortable. They will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfortable pair of shoes. It's two inches of heels but feels like half inch
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy nice and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought an 8w and fit like a glove. Very comfy shoes!! I can wear this all day on my feet taking sessions without issues!
customer_reviews.author: Home Ana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I own (and I have more than 90 pair.) These are versatile and stylish--will buy Clarks brand again.
customer_reviews.author: MissWV

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes but HURT feet over a period of time. I’ve only been wearing them for 4 months and my feet are constantly in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are so cute and fit perfectly! I have to start wearing wide shoes, because of foot issue and this is perfect for my first pair. Great for work or a casual night out
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well made. Clarks never disappoints. They are lovely on.
customer_reviews.author: Orla Maxwell-Frye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice twist on a classic shoe, very versatile and comfortable. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were super comfortable right out the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were super comfortable right out the box. The leather looks great. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because they started making a noise as I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: Clark’s r the best
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They’re super cute and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable, perfect for winter. I want them in all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cylyn

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable leather shoes i ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: It is amazingly comfortable, and the size just fits exactly.. I loved wearing it and walking in it, very soft inside and the very flattering to whichever outfit i wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nadataha2488

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: True to size.. Comfy.. Durable! Been using these for almost 2 years now
customer_reviews.author: Devilitta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect addition to my every day work shoe collection! The sizing is accurate, and they fit/wear comfortably. The leather is of a lower quality than my other Clarks, but still great in comparison to mainstream shoe lines.
customer_reviews.author: Erika33

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very stiff and they fit small. Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of oxfords I've ever owned. Wear them all day
customer_reviews.author: Tconly

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!!! I use them for work and I'm constantly on my feet all day. They are great shoes for pants and dresses. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real cute, but wenreturned them because they were going to rub her ankle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the black pair for 2 years, I get compliments often. I needed a brown pair. LOVE THIS SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Live up to the Clarks reputation of an outstanding shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable - had to go a 1/2 smaller though than my normal 9W. Love the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: kebpo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylist
customer_reviews.text: These fit a little large but this is what I expected. I like the cushion. They feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: s q

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are just as good looking in person
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just as good looking in person. They seem to run a little narrow but are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for work or church! Looks exactly like the pic!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit perfect. i was Completely satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfect.i was Completely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Claeson Pearl Oxford
product_meta.description: A beautiful oxford with a menswear twist. sitting atop an almost 3 inch heel, the claeson pearl is great for wearing to work or dressing up an outfit for a night out. features cushion soft technology and an ortholite footbed for added comfort.
